languages.text: {n}Все салютуют кубками, старательно изображая энтузиазм. Слышна пара смешков, чуть не переходящих в рыдания. Сама Джай сверкает ослепительной улыбкой, ненастоящей, как самоцветы в руках торговца из подулья. Глаза ее застыли и похожи на темные камни.{/n}

{n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все салютуют кубками, старательно изображая энтузиазм. Слышна пара смешков, чуть не переходящих в рыдания. Сама Джай сверкает ослепительной улыбкой, ненастоящей, как самоцветы в руках торговца из подулья. Глаза ее застыли и похожи на темные камни.{/n}

Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}每个人都举起了酒杯，尽可能地做出热情的样子。你听到了几声大笑，似乎马上就要变成啜泣一般。婕伊本人脸上挂着过于耀眼的笑容，仿佛巢都底层商人卖的宝石一样虚假，她的双眼仿佛两个凝固的黑潭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}每个人都举起了酒杯，尽可能地做出热情的样子。你听到了几声大笑，似乎马上就要变成啜泣一般。婕伊本人脸上挂着过于耀眼的笑容，仿佛巢都底层商人卖的宝石一样虚假，她的双眼仿佛两个凝固的黑潭。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}皆がカップを掲げてその熱意を示す。嗚咽に変わりそうなほどの笑い声がいくらか聞こえる。ジェイは、まるでアンダーハイブの商人の宝石のようなまばゆい微笑みを浮かべている。彼女の目は、凍りついた二つの暗いプールのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}皆がカップを掲げてその熱意を示す。嗚咽に変わりそうなほどの笑い声がいくらか聞こえる。ジェイは、まるでアンダーハイブの商人の宝石のようなまばゆい微笑みを浮かべている。彼女の目は、凍りついた二つの暗いプールのようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Todo el mundo levanta sus copas en una muestra decidida de entusiasmo. Oyes algunas risas rayanas en llanto. La propia Jae tiene una sonrisa tan auténtica como las joyas de un mercader del fondo de la colmena. Sus ojos parecen dos estanques oscuros y congelados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Todo el mundo levanta sus copas en una muestra decidida de entusiasmo. Oyes algunas risas rayanas en llanto. La propia Jae tiene una sonrisa tan auténtica como las joyas de un mercader del fondo de la colmena. Sus ojos parecen dos estanques oscuros y congelados.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tout le monde lève son verre pour essayer de montrer son enthousiasme et vous entendez quelques rires qui vous paraissent à deux doigts de se transformer en sanglots. Pour sa part, Jae affiche un sourire éclatant, aussi authentique que les pierres précieuses d'un marchand de sous-ruche. Ses yeux sont comme deux mares noires gelées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout le monde lève son verre pour essayer de montrer son enthousiasme et vous entendez quelques rires qui vous paraissent à deux doigts de se transformer en sanglots. Pour sa part, Jae affiche un sourire éclatant, aussi authentique que les pierres précieuses d'un marchand de sous-ruche. Ses yeux sont comme deux mares noires gelées.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Alle erheben entschlossen und enthusiastisch ihre Becher. Du hörst, wie manche etwas lachen, dabei aber fast in Schluchzen übergehen. Jae selbst zeigt dabei ihr strahlendes Lächeln, das aber so unecht wirkt wie die Edelsteine eines Händlers aus dem Underhive. Ihre Augen wirken wie zwei dunkle Pfützen, die festgefroren sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alle erheben entschlossen und enthusiastisch ihre Becher. Du hörst, wie manche etwas lachen, dabei aber fast in Schluchzen übergehen. Jae selbst zeigt dabei ihr strahlendes Lächeln, das aber so unecht wirkt wie die Edelsteine eines Händlers aus dem Underhive. Ihre Augen wirken wie zwei dunkle Pfützen, die festgefroren sind.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Herkes, hevesli olma gayretiyle kadeh kaldırıyor. Duyduğun birkaç gülüşün ağlamaya dönüşmek üzere olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Jae'ın kendisi; bir kovanaltı tüccarının elindeki kristaller kadar gerçek bir şekilde, kocaman gülümsüyor. Gözleri, kaskatı donmuş iki karanlık havuzu andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone raises their cups in a determined show of enthusiasm. You hear a few snippets of laughter that seem to be on the verge of turning into sobs. Jae herself flashes a dazzling smile as genuine as the gems of an underhive merchant. Her eyes resemble two dark pools that have frozen solid.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Herkes hevesli olmaya çalışarak kadehlerini kaldırıyor. Duyduğun birkaç gülüşün ağlamaya dönüşmek üzere olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Jae'ın kendisi, bir kovanaltı tüccarının elindeki kristaller kadar gerçek bir şekilde, kocaman gülümsüyor. Gözleri, kaskatı donmuş iki karanlık havuzu andırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
